category: Click Boards > Power management > Power Switch
name: mikroe.click.profet10a
short_description: PROFET Click is a compact add-on board that contains a smart high-side power switch. This board features the BTS7008-1EPA, a single-channel, high-side power switch with embedded protection and diagnosis feature from Infineon Technologies. This switch has a driving capability suitable for 10A loads featuring a ReverSaveâ„¢, which causes the power transistor to switch on in case of reverse polarity.
